question: Which of the following taxi starts testing world's first self-flying taxi?
explanation: Dubai made history in the world of aviation when it started testing world's first self-flying taxi recently. The self-flying taxi resembles a small, two-seater helicopter cabin topped by a wide hoop studded with 18 propellers. It is meant to fly without remote control guidance and comes with a lot of fail-proof safety measures such as back-up batteries, rotors and parachutes.
